description: Attaches one or more Classic Load Balancers to the specified Auto Scaling group. To attach an Application Load Balancer or a Network Load Balancer instead, see AttachLoadBalancerTargetGroups. To describe the load balancers for an Auto Scaling group, use DescribeLoadBalancers. To detach the load balancer from the Auto Scaling group, use DetachLoadBalancers. For more information, see Attaching a Load Balancer to Your Auto Scaling Group in the Amazon EC2 Auto Scaling User Guide.
